title: Generate videos from chat with Google Vertex AI (Veo3)
description:
Generate Videos from Chat with Google Vertex AI (Veo3) - Beginner Friendly

Description
Turn any text prompt into a short AI-generated video directly from an n8n chat. This workflow connects a chat trigger to Google Vertex AI‚Äôs Veo3 model, sending your prompt as input and polling until the rendered video is ready. Once complete, the video is converted into a downloadable file you can use anywhere. Perfect for experimenting with AI-driven media or automating creative video generation inside your workflows.

Watch step-by-step guide for these type of workflows here:
www.youtube.com/@automatewithmarc

How It Works

Chat Trigger ‚Äì Start by typing your prompt into an n8n chat.

Post to Vertex AI (Veo3) ‚Äì Sends the prompt to the Veo3 API with parameters like aspect ratio, duration, and resolution.

Wait + Poll Loop ‚Äì Repeatedly checks the operation status until the video is finished.

If + Edit Fields ‚Äì Extracts the base64 video response and metadata.

Convert to File ‚Äì Turns the video into a binary file for download or use in further automations.

Why You‚Äôll Love It

‚ö° Generate custom AI videos in minutes.

üó£Ô∏è Natural workflow ‚Äî just type your idea in chat.

üé• Flexible parameters ‚Äî adjust resolution, aspect ratio, and duration.

üîó Ready for integration ‚Äî feed the output into Google Drive, Slack, or any connected app.

Requirements

Google Cloud project with Vertex AI API enabled.

Google OAuth credentials in n8n.

n8n (Cloud or self-hosted).
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
